title: Bush Heritage R workshops
text:
Hi all, we’re very much looking forward to our 3 days of R’ing with you.
In preparation, please install R, RStudio, and the following R packages. You can just copy and paste the code below into the console of RStudio and hit enter.

Day 1 - Data wrangling and visualisation in R

install.packages(c("tidyverse"))



Day 2 & 3 - Statistical Modelling in R

install.packages('ggplot2', 'patchwork', 'DHARMa', 'MASS', 'Hmsc', 'tmap', 'sf', 'terra', 'tidyr', 'vegan', 'dplyr', 'ggcorrplot', 'fields')

Cheers,
Christina, Caitie and Jackson

title: About Us
text: Dr Christina Buelow is a quantitative ecologist who loves data and models. She got her start as a field ecologist, but these days she spends most of her time behind a computer developing models and tools to solve challenging problems related to conservation and sustainable use of Earth’s ecosystems. Currently, she is working closely with international NGOs to inform climate-smart conservation of coastal ecosystems. Although the website is still under construction, you can find out more about her work here.
